snippet.title: Hades 2 - Nintendo Switch 2 Trailer | Nintendo Switch 2 Direct
snippet.description:
The popular roguelike Hades 2 will bring its randomized battles through Greek Mythology to the Nintendo Switch 2 in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
